title: Rek'Sai's Ult (Void Rush)
body: During game play I have discovered that Rek'Sai's Void Rush movement will still continue if to the Portal she is going to is destroyed, now I'm not sure if it is a bug or if Rek'Sai is ment to continue fast traveling. But i thought i would bring this to the attention of a Riot employee(s).
